attributes.action: STOP BUILDING WIND TURBINES ON SHORE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: up and down the country wind farm after wind farm is being proposed and many are being rejected. It is time to stop trying to fool the British Public that wind farms on shore are a good thing - they are simply cheaper to build than off shore.  Stop building then on-shore.  Most of the locations are poorly chosen - based where they can buy the land rather than the best locations.  Also stop calling them "Farms" or "Parks" - this is a cont to make us all feel "warm and Fuzzy" when this is vandalism and industrialisation of the countrysice
